text: @chuckwoolery Yes, politicized by your #idiotinthewhitehouse.  COVID-19 cases are spiking while he shirks responsibility.  His ignorant, reckless, incompetence is no joke while people are dying.  Shame on those who support this dangerous, fake-ass president. #TrumpOut2020

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
